monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Transforms player into a Blob - Allows to traverse narrow corridors
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: When an allied monster applies a Debuff, it has a 60% chance to gain a random Buff.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Attack Mastery
skills.description: Every physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Broken Immunity
skills.description: Unique Aura: Armor Break on enemies also increases chances to apply Debuffs on them by 20%.

skills.name: Cataclysm
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) magical damage (fire/water/wind/earth) Hits all enemies Applies Burn, Chill, Shock or Poison

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Exploit
skills.description: Attacks that exploit an enemy's weakness have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Death Blow
skills.description: Deals 5% increased damage for each Debuff on the target.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Deep Freeze
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) magical damage (water) Deals an additional 40% hit for every Chill on the target

skills.name: Deep Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) magical damage (water) Deals an additional 40% hit for every Chill on the target

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Electric Field
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Shock on the attacker.

skills.name: Exploit Party
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party exploits an enemy's weakness with an attack, it gains a random Buff and shields by 5% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Freeze
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Frostbite
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Chill on an enemy, 40% chance to also apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Every hit has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Gas
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy takes Poison (Debuff) damage, 40% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Incinerate
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, 40% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Initial Armor Break
skills.description: Apply Armor Break (Debuff) on a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Lava Rush
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (fire) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value if it has Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Lava Rush Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (fire) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value if it has Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magical Weakness
skills.description: Magical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mass Mystify
skills.description: Aura: When an allied monster applies a Debuff, it has a 60% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Mass Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 15% less damage from Multi-Target-Attacks.

skills.name: Poison Eater
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Poison Eater Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Rocket Launch
skills.description: 3 x 110% (330%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff) or Shock (Debuff).

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Slime Shot
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime-ageddon
skills.description: 9 x 60% (540%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison & Weakness (Debuffs)

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Thunder Strike
skills.description: 1 x 370% magical damage (wind) Deals additional 3 x 20% (60%)  damage if the target has Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunder Strike Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 460% magical damage (wind) Deals additional 4 x 20% (80%)  damage if the target has Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Feedback
skills.description: Heal for 5% of Max Health at the start of each turn for each Poison on enemies.

skills.name: Toxic Reaction
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy receives Shock damage, there is a 40% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Voltage
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Cookie Mushroom
drops.description: Increases damage, healing and shielding of this monster by 3%.
